resources.string: Below you will find a list of features you are able to view.

In order to view your data in the field, you must first ensure that you have downloaded your data and forms using the \"Import\" module (see below and follow associated instructions before returning here).

In order to view your data in the field, you must first ensure that you have downloaded your data and forms using the \"Import\" module (see below and follow associated instructions before returning here).
You are using the MapMint application for Monitoring and Evaluation called MapMint4ME.

In order to view your data in the field, you must first ensure that you have downloaded your data and forms using the \"Import\" module (see below and follow associated instructions before returning here).

Before going to the field to collect data, please ensure that you have downloaded the latest version of the Data and related Templates. Once complete, you will be able to start recording your data. Once you have completed your field data collection, you can use the Export button below to post your data back to the MapMint server. Unknown You have not configured any MapMint Server, please configure one. Add a server Map No GPS position GPS Track View feature Your are using the MapMint4ME application. It is provided free of charge under the term of the MIT/X11 License and aims to provide an easy to use editing tool for your own data on the field. The software has been developped and published on GooglePlayâ„¢ by GeoLabs SARL. In case you want to learn how to use this application, please click here MapMint4ME Import, Edit, Export
